data.description: This is an excellent opportunity to contribute to the next generation of AI-driven innovation at Nokia. As a student AI R&D Engineer, you will play a key role in researching and developing advanced AI solutions that leverage Generative AI, autonomous agents, deep learning, and machine learning to enhance a wide range of Nokia products and platforms. Your work will support critical capabilities across analytics, security, and core telecommunications technologies. You will collaborate with experienced researchers, explore new techniques, and help transform cutting-edge ideas into impactful real-world applications.
